处理文件时发生错误.\n详细信息::
An error occurred while processing the file.
Details:
在不改变模型内容的前提下,将mimodel中某个贴图的纹理比例(如下如所示)重置: Without changing the model content, reset the texture scale of a texture in mimodel (as shown below) to 1, and adjust the UV coordinates and block size accordingly, finally generating a processed model file (no texture file will be generated!).
●Only one texture can be processed at a time, and the generated model file can be processed again.
Merge all textures in a model into one texture, finally generating a model file and a texture file.
●Texture merging requires manual layout, press Enter to confirm.
将杂乱无章的UV整理得井然有序(这在接单中比较有用,虽然没什么实际用处),最终生: Organize messy UVs neatly (this is useful in commission work, although not very practical), finally generating a model file and a texture file.
●仅接受纹理比例为1的单一贴图的模型文件.\n●不支持\"混合材质\"项.\n●:
●Only accepts model files with a single texture with texture scale of 1.
●Does not support "Blended Materials".
●New texture width and height should be reasonable, otherwise the program may error or run slowly.
●It is recommended to keep the bottom two checkboxes checked, especially the right one, otherwise the transparency set in ModelBench will be invalid (ModelBench does not support transparency textures, tested!).
将ModelBench中红色的重名部件全部改名为不重名的名称,保证ModelBe: Rename all red duplicate components in ModelBench to non-duplicate names, ensuring name consistency between ModelBench and Mine-imator.
Draw hexadecimal color values of multiple lines as a pixel line and generate as a file.
Fill in the number at the position shown in Modelbench below (not the one in this image!!!).
